english.segment1: I am not skilled to understand. What God has willed, what God has planned. I only know at His right hand. Stands one who is my Savior
english.segment2: I take Him at His word and deed. Christ died to save me; this I read. And in my heart I find a need. Of Him to be my savior
english.segment3: That He would leave His place on high. And come for sinful man to die. You count it strange, so once did I. Before I knew my Savior
english.segment4: Chorus (2x's). My Savior loves, My Savior lives. My Savior's always there for me. My God: He was, my God; He is. My God is always gonna be
english.segment5: Yes, living, dying, let me bring. My strength, my solace from this spring;. That He who lives to be my King. Once died to be my Savior
english.segment6: That He would leave His place on high. And come for sinful man to die. You count it strange, so once did I. Before I knew my Savior
english.segment10: My Savior loves, My Savior lives. My Savior loves, My Savior lives.
